text: Melora Diane Hardin (born June 29, 1967) is an American actress and singer. She is known for her roles as Jan Levinson on NBC's The Office and Trudy Monk on USA's Monk. Hardin was originally cast to play Jennifer Parker in Back to the Future, but was replaced when Eric Stoltz was let go. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Houston Category:Actors from San Francisco
title: Melora Hardin
